tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE music_venues (
    venue_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    venue_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    capacity INT,
    availability BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE
);

CREATE TABLE Event (
  event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  event_date DATE NOT NULL,
  venue_id INT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (venue_id) REFERENCES Venue(venue_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Availability (
  availability_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  venue_id INT NOT NULL,
  event_id INT NOT NULL,
  available_capacity INT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (venue_id) REFERENCES Venue(venue_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES Event(event_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Contact (
  contact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  venue_id INT NOT NULL,
  contact_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  contact_email VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (venue_id) REFERENCES Venue(venue_id)
);

CREATE TABLE MusicVenues (
    venue_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    venue_name VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(50),
    capacity INT,
    availability BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE Events (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name VARCHAR(50),
    date DATE,
    venue_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (venue_id) REFERENCES MusicVenues(venue_id)
);

CREATE TABLE EventCoordinators (
    event_id INT,
    coordinator_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (event_id, coordinator_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES Events(event_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (coordinator_id) REFERENCES Coordinators(coordinator_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_id INT,
    rating INT,
    comment TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES Events(event_id)
);
